name: Makrana White
description: The most common type of Calcite Stone with innate white color. Used for sculpture and building construction.

name: Ketan Green
description: Calcite Stone with innate green color. Widely used for flooring and wall cladding.

name: Makrana Dungri
description: White marble with slightly grey pattern. Preferred for flooring, requires no chemical treatment.

name: Makrana Albeta
description: White color with slightly black lines. Gives a rich look for flooring.

name: Makrana Brown
description: Albeta marble with brown color pattern on top.

name: Makrana Pink
description: Pink color pattern on white. Used for decoration and flooring.

name: Black Paradiso
description: Premium Indian Granite with swirling black and violet patterns.

name: Ivory Brown
description: Beige and light brown granite suitable for large scale cladding.

name: Ze Black
description: Deep black granite, highly durable.

name: Black Forest
description: Bold black granite with sweeping white veins resembling a forest in winter.

name: Colonial Cream
description: Soft cream background with gold and brown speckles.

name: Alaska Gold
description: Stunning gold and warm earth tones.

name: Alaska White
description: Icy white background with blacks and greys.

name: Fusion Gold
description: Dynamic pattern of gold and black, truly unique.

name: Rose Quartz
description: Translucent pink quartz, backlighting recommended.

name: Blue Lace Agate
description: Intricate blue lace patterns, a luxury statement.

name: Amethyst
description: Royal purple semi-precious stone.

name: Petrified Wood Retro
description: Fossilized wood with rich earthy tones.

name: Lapis Lazuli
description: Deep celestial blue with golden pyrite inclusions.

name: Malachite
description: Vivid green banded mineral.

name: Red Multi
description: Vibrant red background with black and grey waves.

name: Viscon White
description: White and grey swirls, distinctive and modern.

name: Tan Brown
description: Classic brown granite with copper colored flecks.

name: Crystal Quartz
description: Clear and icy, perfect for light manipulation.

name: Construction Rebar
description: High-grade steel reinforcement bars for robust construction projects.

name: G4 Green Chilli Fresh
description: Premium fresh green chillies, packed with flavor and heat, cultivated in fertile regions.

name: Dehydrated Onion Powder
description: 100% natural, reliable, and flavor-rich onion powder for food processing.

name: Dehydrated Banana Powder
description: Natural banana powder, retaining nutritional integrity and flavor consistency.
